name: Bead Pattern: Flowers in a Row Bracelet
description:
Bead Pattern: Flowers in a Row Bracelet

Each pattern includes a supply list and detailed instructions with high quality graphics.  This pattern includes instructions to create a bracelet in a choice of two sizes of flat flower beads.

Picture shown uses the small flower beads.


© Bonnie's Beadwork 2006-2009

You may not copy and distribute this pattern.

These patterns are for creating jewelry for personal use only or for gifts.

If you wish to use these patterns to make jewelry to sell, please contact Bonnie's Beadwork for details on licensing.

name: Bead Pattern: Filigree Pendant with Rope Necklace
description:
Bead Pattern: Filigree Pendant with Rope Necklace

This is a pattern for the necklace and pendant in the photo.

Each pattern includes a supply list and detailed instructions with high quality graphics.

You will need seed beads, firepolish beads or crystals, Swarovski margarite as well as a clasp. The filigree is included with the pattern but is currently only available in gold.


© Bonnie's Beadwork 2006-2009

You may not copy and distribute this pattern.

These patterns are for creating jewelry for personal use only or for gifts.

If you wish to use these patterns to make jewelry to sell, please contact Bonnie's Beadwork for details on licensing.
